translations: 面包圈（beignets 是 beignet 的复数形式）
带馅煎饼（beignets 是 beignet 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: The menu had the Italian influence but also a bit of New Orleans with the matzo beignets with lemon curd and fresh mint.
sentences.translation: 菜单受到了意大利做法的影响，但是也有新奥尔良的影响，逾越节带馅煎饼就加了柠檬块和鲜薄荷。

sentences.sentence: A New Orleans coffeehouse selling beignets, an insidious Louisianian cousin of the doughnut that exists to get powdered sugar on your face.
sentences.translation: 一家新奥尔良咖啡屋出售贝奈特饼，它是面包圈家族中小施诡计的一种，吃的时候会把粉状糖弄到脸上去。
